SELECT COUNT(T1.CHANGE_REQUST_ID) AS totcnt FROM (SELECT A.CHANGE_REQUST_ID , A.CHANGE_RQESTER_ID , NVL(D.MBER_NM,'') AS CHANGE_RQESTER_NM , A.CHANGE_REQUST_PROCESS_ID , A.OPER_JOB_SE_CODE , C.CODE_NM AS OPER_JOB_SE_CODE_NM , A.CHANGE_REQUST_NM , A.CHANGE_REQUST_DE , A.EMRGNCY_REQUST_AT , B.CODE_NM AS EMRGNCY_REQUST_AT_NM FROM OE1TNCHANGEREQUSTINFO A left outer join OE1TNOECOMMDETAILCD B on B.CODE_ID = 'OE1005' AND A.EMRGNCY_REQUST_AT = B.CODE left outer join OE1TNOECOMMDETAILCD C on C.CODE_ID = 'OE1020' AND A.OPER_JOB_SE_CODE = C.CODE left outer join OE1TNUSERINFO D on A.CHANGE_RQESTER_ID = D.MBER_ID ) T1 left outer join (SELECT a.CHANGE_REQUST_PROCESS_ID ,a.CHANGE_PROCESS_STTUS_CODE ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(a.CHANGE_RCEPT_DE,'yyyymmdd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') AS CHANGE_RCEPT_DE ,b.code_nm AS CHANGE_PROCESS_STTUS_NM ,c.mber_nm AS CHANGE_OPERTOR_ID FROM OE1TNCHANGEPROCINFO a left outer join OE1TNOECOMMDETAILCD b on b.code_id = 'OE1003' AND a.CHANGE_PROCESS_STTUS_CODE = b.CODE left outer join OE1TNUSERINFO c on c.MBER_ID = a.CHANGE_OPERTOR_ID ) T2 on ( T1.CHANGE_REQUST_PROCESS_ID= T2.CHANGE_REQUST_PROCESS_ID ) WHERE 1=1
T1.OPER_JOB_SE_CODE = #searchOperJobSeCode#
NVL(T2.CHANGE_PROCESS_STTUS_CODE,'01')IN ('01','02')
T2.CHANGE_PROCESS_STTUS_CODE = #searchChangeProcessSttusCode#
T2.CHANGE_PROCESS_STTUS_CODE IS NULL
T1.EMRGNCY_REQUST_AT = #searchEmrgncyRequstAt#
T1.CHANGE_REQUST_NM LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
T2.CHANGE_OPERTOR_ID LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rn, TB.* FROM ( SELECT T1.CHANGE_REQUST_ID ,T1.CHANGE_REQUST_PROCESS_ID ,NVL(T2.CHANGE_PROCESS_STTUS_NM,'요청') AS CHANGE_PROCESS_STTUS_CODE_NM ,NVL(T2.CHANGE_PROCESS_STTUS_CODE,'01') AS CHANGE_PROCESS_STTUS_CODE ,T1.OPER_JOB_SE_CODE_NM AS OPER_JOB_SE_CODE ,T1.CHANGE_REQUST_NM ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(T1.CHANGE_REQUST_DE,'yyyymmdd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') AS CHANGE_REQUST_DE ,T1.EMRGNCY_REQUST_AT_NM AS EMRGNCY_REQUST_AT ,NVL(T2.CHANGE_RCEPT_DE,'-') AS CHANGE_RCEPT_DE ,NVL(T2.CHANGE_OPERTOR_ID,'-') AS CHANGE_OPERTOR_ID ,T1.CHANGE_RQESTER_ID ,T1.CHANGE_RQESTER_NM FROM (SELECT A.CHANGE_REQUST_ID , A.CHANGE_RQESTER_ID , NVL(D.MBER_NM,'') AS CHANGE_RQESTER_NM , A.CHANGE_REQUST_PROCESS_ID , A.OPER_JOB_SE_CODE , C.CODE_NM AS OPER_JOB_SE_CODE_NM , A.CHANGE_REQUST_NM , A.CHANGE_REQUST_DE , A.EMRGNCY_REQUST_AT , B.CODE_NM AS EMRGNCY_REQUST_AT_NM , A.FRST_REGISTER_PNTTM FROM OE1TNCHANGEREQUSTINFO A left outer join OE1TNOECOMMDETAILCD B on B.CODE_ID = 'OE1005' AND A.EMRGNCY_REQUST_AT = B.CODE left outer join OE1TNOECOMMDETAILCD C on C.CODE_ID = 'OE1020' AND A.OPER_JOB_SE_CODE = C.CODE left outer join OE1TNUSERINFO D on A.CHANGE_RQESTER_ID = D.MBER_ID ) T1 left outer join (SELECT a.CHANGE_REQUST_PROCESS_ID ,a.CHANGE_PROCESS_STTUS_CODE ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(a.CHANGE_RCEPT_DE,'yyyymmdd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') AS CHANGE_RCEPT_DE ,b.code_nm AS CHANGE_PROCESS_STTUS_NM ,c.mber_nm AS CHANGE_OPERTOR_ID FROM OE1TNCHANGEPROCINFO a left outer join OE1TNOECOMMDETAILCD b on b.code_id = 'OE1003' AND a.CHANGE_PROCESS_STTUS_CODE = b.CODE left outer join OE1TNUSERINFO c on c.MBER_ID = a.CHANGE_OPERTOR_ID ) T2 on ( T1.CHANGE_REQUST_PROCESS_ID= T2.CHANGE_REQUST_PROCESS_ID ) WHERE 1=1
T1.OPER_JOB_SE_CODE = #searchOperJobSeCode#
NVL(T2.CHANGE_PROCESS_STTUS_CODE,'01')IN ('01','02')
T2.CHANGE_PROCESS_STTUS_CODE = #searchChangeProcessSttusCode#
T2.CHANGE_PROCESS_STTUS_CODE IS NULL
T1.EMRGNCY_REQUST_AT = #searchEmrgncyRequstAt#
T1.CHANGE_REQUST_NM LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
T2.CHANGE_OPERTOR_ID LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY T1.FRST_REGISTER_PNTTM DESC ) TB ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #firstIndex# + 1 AND #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO OE1TNCHANGEPROCINFO ( CHANGE_REQUST_PROCESS_ID , CHANGE_RCEPT_DE , CHANGE_PROCESS_STTUS_CODE , CHANGE_SE_CODE , EMRGNCY_PROCESS_AT , CHANGE_AFFC_SE_CODE , CHANGE_SCOPE_SE_CODE , CHANGE_CONFM_AT , CHANGE_CONFM_DE , CHANGE_EXMNT_OPINION , PLAN_EXMNT_MNDT_AT , COMPT_EXMNT_MNDT_AT , CHANGE_OPERTOR_ID , FRST_REGISTER_PNTTM , FRST_REGISTER_ID , LAST_UPDUSR_PNTTM , LAST_UPDUSR_ID ) VALUES ( #changeRequstProcessId# , TO_CHAR(sysdate,'yyyymmdd') , '02' , #changeSeCode# , #emrgncyProcessAt# , #changeAffcSeCode# , #changeScopeSeCode# , #changeConfmAt# , replace(#changeConfmDe#,'-','') , #changeExmntOpinion# , NVL(#planExmntMndtAt#,'N') , NVL(#comptExmntMndtAt#,'N') , #changeOpertorId# , sysdate , #frstRegisterId# , sysdate , #frstRegisterId# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE OE1TNCHANGEPROCINFO SET CHANGE_PROCESS_STTUS_CODE = '02' , CHANGE_SE_CODE = #changeSeCode# , EMRGNCY_PROCESS_AT = #emrgncyProcessAt# , CHANGE_AFFC_SE_CODE = #changeAffcSeCode# , CHANGE_SCOPE_SE_CODE = #changeScopeSeCode# , CHANGE_CONFM_AT = NVL(#changeConfmAt#,'N') , CHANGE_CONFM_DE = REPLACE(#changeConfmDe#,'-','') , CHANGE_EXMNT_OPINION = #changeExmntOpinion# , PLAN_EXMNT_MNDT_AT = NVL(#planExmntMndtAt#,'N') , COMPT_EXMNT_MNDT_AT = NVL(#comptExmntMndtAt#,'N') , CHANGE_OPERTOR_ID = #changeOpertorId# , LAST_UPDUSR_PNTTM = sysdate , LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #lastUpdusrId# WHERE CHANGE_REQUST_PROCESS_ID = #changeRequstProcessId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT CHANGE_REQUST_PROCESS_ID AS changeRequstProcessId , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CHANGE_RCEPT_DE,'yyyymmdd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') AS changeRceptDe , CHANGE_PROCESS_STTUS_CODE AS changeProcessSttusCode , C.CODE_NM AS changeProcessSttusCodeNm , D.CODE_NM AS changeSeCode , E.CODE_NM AS emrgncyProcessAt , F.CODE_NM AS changeAffcSeCode , G.CODE_NM AS changeScopeSeCode , CHANGE_CONFM_AT AS changeConfmAt , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CHANGE_CONFM_DE,'yyyymmdd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') AS changeConfmDe , CHANGE_EXMNT_OPINION AS changeExmntOpinion , PLAN_EXMNT_MNDT_AT AS planExmntMndtAt , COMPT_EXMNT_MNDT_AT AS comptExmntMndtAt , B.MBER_NM AS changeOpertorNm FROM OE1TNCHANGEPROCINFO A LEFT OUTER JOIN OE1TNUSERINFO B on A.CHANGE_OPERTOR_ID = B.MBER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN OE1TNOECOMMDETAILCD C on C.CODE_ID = 'OE1003' AND A.CHANGE_PROCESS_STTUS_CODE = C.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN OE1TNOECOMMDETAILCD D on D.CODE_ID = 'OE1016' AND A.CHANGE_SE_CODE = D.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN OE1TNOECOMMDETAILCD E on E.CODE_ID = 'OE1005' AND A.EMRGNCY_PROCESS_AT = E.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN OE1TNOECOMMDETAILCD F on F.CODE_ID = 'OE1017' AND A.CHANGE_AFFC_SE_CODE = F.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN OE1TNOECOMMDETAILCD G on G.CODE_ID = 'OE1018' AND A.CHANGE_SCOPE_SE_CODE = G.CODE WHERE CHANGE_REQUST_PROCESS_ID = #changeRequstProcessId#

SELECT CHANGE_REQUST_PROCESS_ID AS changeRequstProcessId , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CHANGE_RCEPT_DE,'yyyymmdd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') AS changeRceptDe , CHANGE_PROCESS_STTUS_CODE AS changeProcessSttusCode , C.CODE_NM AS changeProcessSttusCodeNm , CHANGE_SE_CODE AS changeSeCode , EMRGNCY_PROCESS_AT AS emrgncyProcessAt , CHANGE_AFFC_SE_CODE AS changeAffcSeCode , CHANGE_SCOPE_SE_CODE AS changeScopeSeCode , CHANGE_CONFM_AT AS changeConfmAt , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CHANGE_CONFM_DE,'yyyymmdd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') AS changeConfmDe , CHANGE_EXMNT_OPINION AS changeExmntOpinion , PLAN_EXMNT_MNDT_AT AS planExmntMndtAt , COMPT_EXMNT_MNDT_AT AS comptExmntMndtAt , CHANGE_OPERTOR_ID AS changeOpertorId , B.MBER_NM AS changeOpertorNm FROM OE1TNCHANGEPROCINFO A LEFT OUTER JOIN OE1TNUSERINFO B on A.CHANGE_OPERTOR_ID = B.MBER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN OE1TNOECOMMDETAILCD C on C.CODE_ID = 'OE1003' AND A.CHANGE_PROCESS_STTUS_CODE = C.CODE WHERE CHANGE_REQUST_PROCESS_ID = #changeRequstProcessId#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE OE1TNCHANGEREQUSTINFO SET CHANGE_REQUST_PROCESS_ID = #changeRequstProcessId# , LAST_UPDUSR_PNTTM = sysdate , LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #lastUpdusrId# WHERE CHANGE_REQUST_ID = #changeRequstId#
